Sequence Information.Source: frog,Pelophylax nigromaculatus, frog, amphibians, animals, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (75%) toNigrocin-2G: 25%; V=L: 17%; K: 13%;   GRAVY: 0.258; M Wt:  2471.027; Mol formula: C106H192N34O29S2; Mol ex coeff: 0.Activity: Active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 32 ug/ml), S. enteritidis (MIC 64 ug/ml), and S.aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC >128 ug/ml).Toxicity: porcine RBC: HC50 >128 ug/ml.
Literature Information.Author: Richter A, Sutherland D, Ebrahimikondori H, Babcock A, Louie N, Li C, Coombe L, Lin D, Warren RL, Yanai A, Kotkoff M, Helbing CC, Hof F, Hoang LMN, Birol I. 2022
Literature Information.Title: Associating biological activity and predicted structure of antimicrobial peptides from amphibians and insects
